New Community Playground In Vaidivia

Location: Valdivia, Chile
Date: 11/1/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

Take a look at Full urbano’s latest project in Chile—a community playground with stunning views over Valdivia! Featuring a vibrant Rosehill TPV® softfall surface, this playground combines fun, safety, and colour, creating an inviting space for children to play while providing essential cushioning against slips and falls.With 21 colours available, Rosehill TPV® makes it simple to create custom blends for unique, long-lasting designs that stay vibrant, even after years of exposure to harsh climates. Plus, our safe, non-toxic formulation ensures a surface free from harmful substances, meeting the highest international standards for safety and environmental care.

Ready to Transform Your Space?

Contact us today to discuss how Rosehill TPV® can create safe, vibrant surfaces for your project.
